books.author: by Kody, Meri, Janelle, Christine and Robyn Brown
books.description: The stars of the TLC reality show describe their polygamous marriage.
books.name: BECOMING SISTER WIVES

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Edward Klein
books.description: A journalist argues that President Obama is callow, arrogant and unable to lead.
books.name: AMATEUR

books.author: by Rielle Hunter
books.description: John Edwards’s mistress and the mother of his child tells her version of their story.
books.name: WHAT REALLY HAPPENED

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The anchor of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: William E. Dodd, the U.S. ambassador to Germany, and his daughter, Martha, in 1930s Berlin.
books.name: IN THE GARDEN OF BEASTS

books.author: by Marcus Samuelsson
books.description: The award-winning chef discusses his career and recalls growing up as an Ethiopian child adopted by a Swedish family.
books.name: YES, CHEF

books.author: by Marco Rubio
books.description: A memoir by the Florida senator, the Miami-born child of Cuban exiles.
books.name: AMERICAN SON

books.author: by Glenn Beck and Kevin Balfe
books.description: The radio host and founder of GBTV discusses 13 lies that politicians, academics and the media perpetuate.
books.name: COWARDS

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Jenny Lawson
books.description: A blogger recalls her unusual upbringing.
books.name: LET'S PRETEND THIS NEVER HAPPENED

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an emergency appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood during which she was constantly moved from place to place.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the recently deceased entrepreneur, based on 40 interviews with Jobs conducted over two years.
books.name: STEVE JOBS
